name: ringstat
description: Find statistics, comparisons, ratings of athletes. Contribute by giving your own ratings or feedback on athletes.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run webhook"
scripts.inspect-brk: concurrently "nodemon --inspect-brk index.js" "npm run client" "npm run webhook"
scripts.install-client: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.install-ringstat: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
